nodes.text: Architect's Hollow was a cave on Yavin 4. At the time of the Galactic War, the dark side spirit of Marka Ragnos, a Dark Lord of the Sith who lived during the time of the first Sith Empire, haunted that cave.
The Architect's Hollow appears as an area on Yavin in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion.
